outline:
1. to love, love deeply, have mercy, be compassionate, have tender affection, have compassion
    1. (Qal) to love
    2. (Piel)
      1. to have compassion, be compassionate
        1. of God, man
      2. (Pual) to be shown compassion, be compassionate
kjv_def: have compassion (on, upon), love, (find, have, obtain, shew) mercy(-iful, on, upon), (have) pity, Ruhamah, [idiom] surely.
strongs_def: to fondle; by implication, to love, especially to compassionate
